name: ron-client
description: UI showing Ron Swanson quotes and allowing votes

scripts.once: npm install && npm run build.phoenix && cd ../server && mix deps.get && mix phx.server
scripts.build.phoenix: rm -rf ../server/priv && mkdir -p ../server/priv/static && npm run build && cp dist/main.js public/bundle.js && cp -r public ./static && mv ./static ../server/priv/.
scripts.build: npm run transpile && npm run bundle

author: nicholasgriffen
